lead_paragraph: Intellectual discourse predominates in this cerebral film whose pleasures are more of the mind than the heart.

headline.main: Review: Look, Yes, but Listening Is the Key to ‘The Academy of Muses’

snippet: Intellectual discourse predominates in this cerebral film whose pleasures are more of the mind than the heart....
abstract: Ken Jaworowski reviews movie The Academy of Muses, written and directed by Jose Luis Guerin.
